title: Great for smoothies.
body: Very nice blender I use daily for smoothies. Chops ice well.

title: Excelente equipo Ninja
body: Excelente producto lo recomiendo

title: Easy to clean.
body: Works great

title: Good buy heavy duty
body: Not as easy as I expected used nutri bullet for years thought I'd get something with more capacity. Suction cups work great. Two cups with lids good buy

title: Easy to clean
body: I should have bought the larger one. Smoothies are perfect in this thing. Easy to clean and push out of the way when not in use.

title: great quality
body: great quality, totally easy to use - I did a carrot/apple/parsley/protein powder smoothie - it totally liquified everything in about ten seconds. Am totally pleased.

title: Leak
body: I bought this last January. I’ve always had great results with it. Recently it’s started leaking from underneath the blade into the base unit. There doesn’t seem to be anything to tighten. There was nothing helpful in the troubleshooting section and I don’t see a place to ask a question of the seller. I’ve taken good care of the components and only hand wash them. I’m disappointed this only worked well for less than a year.

title: 11 MONTHS AND stopped
body:
GOOD UNTIL IT STOPS WORKING!
In addition ZERO Ninja trouble shooting support by going on website. Nothing so had to buy another blender. Very maddening. They do not care! it was really only 10 months of use until it died

title: Great personal blender!
body: I have historically used the Vitamix but when I moved out on my own, getting a personal blender made more sense. I was scared cause I heard these break easily, but I use it about 4 days a week for the past 3 months and no issue! I usually do have to blend things twice for it to be really smooth, but it works well so far!

title: Cheap and not meant to last, but decent
body:
I bought this blender 8 months ago the ago in 4/2025 (it’s now 12/2025) and while it’s decent, if I had the money I would have bought a more reliable slightly more expensive blender.

Overall, the covers they provide are flimsy. The lids lose their ability to lock tightly overtime, so spills are common when the flip-open tabs seemingly flip up by themselves at the slightest gust of air. All parts are also incredibly difficult to keep clean or without any remnant orders. After drinking I immediately place all items in the dishwasher, and have even tried hand washing on my own a couple of times. The cups, lids, and even the blender top just retain smells (not mold, but the smells of previous meals) that overall speak to the product being of poor quality.

You can’t put too many frozen pieces of fruit in here, because the blades aren’t that sharp and it will take multiple cycles to crush up the fruit into a yogurt consistency at best. The product after all this time also overheats when I have to blend more than twice.

Overall, if you can’t buy anything better and want a cheap blender go ahead and get this one. It’s not the best value for your money but it works.
